title: Intermediate Language Proficiency Enhancement Program Using Collaborative Virtual Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and beginner-level language comprehension
context.additional_context: Providing a collaborative learning environment in virtual spaces focused on real-life language scenarios

learning_goals: Accurately use appropriate language expressions for situational contexts in over 80% of role-playing interactions with peer learners in VR environments.
Over 90% of learners improve their ability to utilize VR tools while performing collaborative problem-solving tasks.
Through weekly project-based assessments, over 75% of learners demonstrate language application skills linked to real-world tasks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
